import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { CartItemsContext } from '../../components/context/cartContext'; import ProductQuanityBox from './../../components/ProductQuanity'; import '../styles/Checkout.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, }); function Checkout() { const { products, setProduct, subTotal } = React.useContext(CartItemsContext); const testQuanity = (quanity, item) => setProduct([...products, { item, quanity }]); // console.log([{ ...item, quanity }]); return (

My Cart

{products.map(({ name, src, price, color, sku, quanity, key }) => (

{name}

{`$${price}`}

Color: {color}

{`${formatter.format(price * quanity)}`}

))}

Subtotal

{subTotal}

Shipping

Free

Oklahoma, United States

Total

{subTotal}
); } function CheckoutActions() { const [toggle, setToggle] = useState({ promo: false, note: false }); return (
); } export default Checkout;
